description: {"blocks":[{"key":"35v6r","text":"The fluorescent gelatin degradation assay is a method to study cell invasion by detecting gelatinase activity in vitro upon epifluorescence microscopy analysis. In this protocol, the method has been applied to evaluate the effect of hypoxic EVs from TNBC cell line MDA-MB-231 in a direct co-culture assay, using four cellular models for the tumor microenvironment. Hence, MDA-MB-231 (tumor cell), HUVEC (endothelial cell), HDFa (dermal fibroblast), and THP-1 (monocyte) have been seeded in six distinct combinations. Adapted from Pachane et al (2022) (PMID: 36293503).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1apll","text":"Open a new 96-well black plate under sterile conditions and label groups in technical triplicates to contain a vehicle (PBS) control (i.e., untreated cells in OptiMEM) and the EVh-treated group (i.e., EVh-treated cells in OptiMEM) for each co-culture combination:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":111,"length":21},{"style":"bold","offset":175,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cggk0","text":"MDA-MB-231 + HUVEC","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4016","text":"MDA-MB-231 + HDFa","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dqgp","text":"MDA-MB-231 + THP-1","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hqco","text":"HUVEC + HDFa","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3k16","text":"HUVEC + THP-1","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67s6","text":"HDFa + THP-1","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

(5000 cells/well)","HUVEC (5000 cells/well)"],["MDA-HDFa","MDA-MB-231 (5000 cells/well)","HDFa (2000 cells/well)"],["MDA-THP1","MDA-MB-231 (5000 cells/well)","THP-1 (2000 {"blocks":[{"key":"6au7k","text":"Treat cells with EVh (109 particles/ml) or the equivalent treatment volume in PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":24,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ltp2","text":"Remove the supernatant by aspiration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pi9","text":"Fix cells with  warmed 4% PFA at  for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"476bf","text":"Wash cells twice with   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"g39n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"PBS.","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajr1e","text":"Permeabilize cells with  at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ch5kc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"0.1% Triton X-100","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2eq4k","text":"Wash cells twice with   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"21rdt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"PBS.","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ds4s","text":"Stain cells with the DAPI + Phalloidin-647 mixture. Add  to each well and incubate at  for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"of staining solution","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":", protected from light","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94ves","text":"Wash cells twice with   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"PBS.","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b761u","text":"Maintain wells with for analysis. Seal the plate with  and cover it with aluminum foil for storage at   for up to 6 months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":54,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"PBS","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41058667341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Parafilm","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":4},"url":"","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9o9v","text":"Using the microscope ImageXpress Micro XLS+ (Molecular Devices), check the template for the Corning 3603 plate and the filters for DAPI (nuclei), FITC (gelatin), TxRed (CMPTX) and Cy5 (phalloidin-647).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqhd8","text":"Set laser intensity to a minimum of 10 ms and increase gradatively if necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ujca","text":"Check the wells using the 4X objective.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5s3e","text":"Change into the 20x objective and adjust the laser focus. Select 9 sites per well minimally.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e1f40","text":"Acquire the plate. Export metadata for analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1a0j","text":"For representative images, change to the 40x objective and adjust the laser focus. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4usm2","text":"Select the sites of interest and acquire. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hmpm","text":"Export image channels and combinations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5udur","text":"On FIJI (ImageJ), import HTD files through BioFormats.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54mrl","text":"Images should already be scaled. If not, adjust scale based on the objective lens used for acquisition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b61q9","text":"Set measurements to contain \"Area\", \"Standard Deviation\", \"Shape Descriptor\", \"Mean grey value\", \"Perimeter\" and \"Display label\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cqbl7","text":"Concatenate all stacks into a single hyperstack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f34rh","text":"Split channels and select the FITC stack for analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0km0","text":"Set a threshold to encompass the degradation spots but not the background. Write down the threshold values. Create a new stack with the binary images. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqhii","text":"To measure the degraded area, analyze particles with a range of \"5-Infinity\" and select \"Summarize\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3lftk","text":"Save CSV file. The degraded area (in µm2) per site will be compared between groups in the statistical analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag3s5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"69mhl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"60BA058604454446956F59C9E14496FE","step_guid":"6E42CBABC0804F08A5AF5E4D2CCD83FB","title":"and continue until Step #30."}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4gt1p","text":"Split channels and select the DAPI stack for counting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5rrc","text":"Set a threshold to contain nuclei. Create a new stack with the binary images.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"co9i7","text":"To count cells, analyze particles with a range of \"10-infinity\" and select \"Summarize\". ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9r9l9","text":"Save CSV file. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e50h3","text":"Split channels and select the Cy5 stack for analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag3s5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"69mhl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"60BA058604454446956F59C9E14496FE","step_guid":"6E42CBABC0804F08A5AF5E4D2CCD83FB","title":"and continue until Step #30."}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ek75n","text":"Duplicate the stack as a guide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dm8ic","text":"Set a threshold to encompass cell cytoplasm. Create a new stack with the binary images.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnpid","text":"Save CSV file. The cell circularity index of each cell will be compared between groups in the statistical analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5co7m","text":"To analyze cell morphology, analyze particles with a range of \"10-Infinity\" and check \"Clear Results\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"envt9","text":"Using the duplicated stack as a guide, section cells using the \"pencil\" tool with a 3 px thickness.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4oqg3","text":"Merge the Cy5 stack with the TxRed stack to visually differentiate cell types.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ihgb","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6qoum","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B4A65ECD2B674CEB944DFAF63A9E1D8A","step_guid":"6E42CBABC0804F08A5AF5E4D2CCD83FB","title":"and continue until Step #30."}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"m1pt","text":"Split the channels of the stacks of interest.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"rp08","text":"Adjust channel colors using the \"Lookup Tables\" menu.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4lu4b","text":"Select the cell of interest in a 200x200 px squared selection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"64o7r","text":"Save selections in each channel and the combination of all channels in PNG images.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
